assignment.name: For : 3) Sum of even/odd in a range

files.name: main.py
files.content:
number = 0
isEven = 0
isOdd = 0
evenCount = 0
oddCount = 0
startNumber = int(input("Starting number? "))
endNumber = int(input("Ending number? "))

while((endNumber < startNumber) or (endNumber == startNumber)):
    print("Ending number must be greater than", startNumber)
    endNumber = int(input("Ending number? "))
    

print("In the range", startNumber, "to", endNumber)

for counter in range (startNumber, endNumber + 1):
    
    if(counter == 0): continue
    
    if(counter % 2 == 0):
        isEven = isEven + counter
        evenCount = evenCount + 1
        
        
    else:
        isOdd = isOdd + counter
        oddCount = oddCount + 1
        
        
print("There are", evenCount, "even numbers with a sum of", isEven)
print("There are", oddCount, "odd numbers with a sum of", isOdd)
